casebody.data:
EDMONDS
v.
FRESENIUS MEDICAL CARE. No. 487A04. Supreme Court of North Carolina. October 12, 2004. Shannon P. Herndon, Charlotte, for Fresenius Medical Care. *467Randy D. Duncan, for Edmonds.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 12th day of October 2004 by Defendant for Extension of Time to File Brief:

"Motion Allowed. Defendant (Fresenius Medical Care) shall have up to and including the 17th day of November 2004 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court. By order of the Court in conference this the 12th day of October 2004."
